"name":"vaultMintTo","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"Shared across all bond series. Predeployed with the bonds contract as ContractAddresses.BONDS. FEATURES: - Standard ERC20 (transfer, transferFrom, approve) - Minter-controlled mint/burn - Vault escrow system for pre-allocated liquidity - Nuke function to permanently disable all operations SECURITY: - Only ContractAddresses.BONDS (DegenerusBonds) can mint tokens - Only ContractAddresses.BONDS can burn without approval - Vault mint allowance provides capped liquidity provision - Disabled flag prevents all operations after game shutdown","kind":"dev","methods":{"approve(address,uint256)":{"details":"Standard ERC20 approve. No active check (approvals work even when disabled).","params":{"amount":"Maximum amount spender can transfer.","spender":"Address authorized to spend."},"returns":{"_0":"Always returns true."}},"burn(address,uint256)":{"details":"Minter can burn without approval; others need approval or self-burn.      Reverts if disabled.","params":{"amount":"Amount to burn.","from":"Address to burn from."}},"mint(address,uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by ContractAddresses.BONDS (DegenerusBonds). Reverts if disabled.      Used for jackpot emissions.","params":{"amount":"Amount to mint.","to":"Recipient address."}},"nuke()":{"details":"Only callable by ContractAddresses.BONDS. Used during game shutdown.      IRREVERSIBLE - once nuked, token cannot be reactivated."},"setVault(address)":{"details":"Called by ContractAddresses.BONDS during initialization. No-op for verification only.","params":{"vault_":"Address of the vault contract (must match ContractAddresses.VAULT)."}},"supplyIncUncirculated()":{"details":"Used for reserve calculations (total potential supply).","returns":{"_0":"Total circulating + vault allowance."}},"transfer(address,uint256)":{"details":"Reverts if token is disabled or insufficient balance.","params":{"amount":"Amount to transfer.","to":"Recipient address."},"returns":{"_0":"Always returns true on success."}},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Reverts if token is disabled, insufficient balance, or insufficient allowance.      Infinite allowance (type(uint256).max) is not decremented.","params":{"amount":"Amount to transfer.","from":"Address to transfer from.","to":"Recipient address."},"returns":{"_0":"Always returns true on success."}},"vaultEscrow(uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by ContractAddresses.BONDS or vault. Used when new series needs liquidity.","params":{"amount":"Amount to add to vault allowance."}},"vaultMintAllowance()":{"returns":{"_0":"The amount the vault can still mint."}},"vaultMintTo(address,uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by vault. Allowance decremented before mint.","params":{"amount":"Amount to mint.","to":"Recipient address."}}},"stateVariables":{"_vaultMintAllowance":{"details":"Starts at 50 ETH equivalent; vault can mint up to this without new allocation."}},"title":"BondToken","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"AlreadySet()":[{"notice":"Thrown when attempting to change already-set allowance."}],"InsufficientBalance()":[{"notice":"Thrown when transfer/burn amount exceeds balance."}],"Unauthorized()":[{"notice":"Thrown when caller lacks permission for the operation."}]},"events":{"Approval(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted on approval changes."},"Transfer(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Emitted on token transfer (including mint/burn with zero addresses)."}},"kind":"user","methods":{"allowance(address,address)":{"notice":"Spending allowances (owner \u2192 spender \u2192 amount)."},"approve(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Approve a spender to transfer tokens on behalf of the caller."},"balanceOf(address)":{"notice":"Token balance per address."},"burn(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Burn tokens from an d8bfee9d916a6e35ac6d91dc9d7312","dweb:/ipfs/QmNmQNtxECyZU5qXKtR4QhVxyW6onKkau74RnBRYxu3rCG"]},"contracts/interfaces/IStETH.sol":{"keccak256":"0x5a70bd9c7f58e2ffd8bde4444d358be2a58b40bb49282673591efcbf3d5a8dc7","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://5a1e32863741f5e7cb909d8b2fbd48f68d1d852f306b7736595becb774883a50","dweb:/ipfs/Qmcnh8Ujdb8zkWReUXADrfx4yopkB3YHj7dPm59iwozoFj"]}},"version":1}

approve(address,uint256).details: Standard ERC20 approve. No active check (approvals work even when disabled).

burn(address,uint256).details: Minter can burn without approval; others need approval or self-burn.      Reverts if disabled.

mint(address,uint256).details: Only callable by ContractAddresses.BONDS (DegenerusBonds). Reverts if disabled.      Used for jackpot emissions.

nuke().details: Only callable by ContractAddresses.BONDS. Used during game shutdown.      IRREVERSIBLE - once nuked, token cannot be reactivated.

setVault(address).details: Called by ContractAddresses.BONDS during initialization. No-op for verification only.

params.vault_: Address of the vault contract (must match ContractAddresses.VAULT).

supplyIncUncirculated().details: Used for reserve calculations (total potential supply).

transfer(address,uint256).details: Reverts if token is disabled or insufficient balance.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Reverts if token is disabled, insufficient balance, or insufficient allowance.      Infinite allowance (type(uint256).max) is not decremented.

vaultEscrow(uint256).details: Only callable by ContractAddresses.BONDS or vault. Used when new series needs liquidity.

params.amount: Amount to add to vault allowance.

returns._0: The amount the vault can still mint.

vaultMintTo(address,uint256).details: Only callable by vault. Allowance decremented before mint.

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approve a spender to transfer tokens on behalf of the caller.

mint(address,uint256).notice: Mint new tokens to an address.

setVault(address).notice: Validate vault address matches expected constant (idempotent check).

supplyIncUncirculated().notice: Get total supply including uncirculated vault allowance.

totalSupply().notice: Total tokens in circulation (excludes vault allowance).

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfer tokens on behalf of another address (requires approval).

vaultEscrow(uint256).notice: Add to the vault's mint allowance (escrow more tokens).

vaultMintAllowance().notice: Get the current vault mint allowance.

vaultMintTo(address,uint256).notice: Mint tokens using vault's pre-allocated allowance.
